subject: Personal Finance
title: The Dopamine Hit of Trading
description: A quick win: understand The Dopamine Hit of Trading.

hook.text: Day traders get the same brain response as slot machine players. The variable reward is addictive.

buildup.text: Every trade is a bet. Wins trigger dopamine, the brain's pleasure chemical. You want another hit.

discovery.text: Trading apps use push notifications, confetti, and gamified interfaces to amplify this effect.

twist.text: Studies show 80% of day traders lose money. The dopamine doesn't care about your returns.

options: Variable rewards trigger dopamine like gambling
